backlog.title: Refactor Zown Monorepo into Micro-repos
backlog.description: Extract zown-governor, zown-console, etc. into separate repositories. Link via zown-nexus registry. Each app manages its own GitHub tickets.

backlog.title: Update Zown Engine Title
backlog.description: Update HTML title in zown-console/index.html to 'ZOWN ENGINE'.

backlog.title: Zown Nexus MVP
backlog.description: Design and build MVP for Zown Nexus: a registry for AI agents to share projects, tickets, and eventually tips.

backlog.title: Implement 'list' command in zown-governor
backlog.description: The CLI currently lacks a way to view the backlog. Add a  command to  class and  to display tasks. Support optional status filtering.
backlog.result: Implemented getTasks in Governor class and list command in CLI. Supports optional status filtering.

backlog.title: Build Operations Dashboard
backlog.description: Create a web interface (Zown Console) to visualize state.json: backlog, budget, and health.

backlog.title: Implement Circuit Breaker
backlog.description: Add error counting and temporary pause logic to zown-governor to prevent API burnout.
